57 template<class OrdinalType>
58 class SerialCommStatus : public CommStatus<OrdinalType> {
59 public:
61  SerialCommStatus () {}
62 
64  OrdinalType getSourceRank () { return 0; }
65 };

72 template<typename Ordinal>
73 class SerialComm : public Comm<Ordinal> {
74 public:
75 
77 
78 
80  SerialComm();
81 
83  SerialComm(const SerialComm<Ordinal>& other);
84 
86 
88 
89 
91  virtual int getRank() const;
93  virtual int getSize() const;
95  virtual void barrier() const;
97  virtual void broadcast(
98  const int rootRank, const Ordinal bytes, char buffer[]
99  ) const;
101  virtual void gatherAll(
102  const Ordinal sendBytes, const char sendBuffer[]
103  ,const Ordinal recvBytes, char recvBuffer[]
104  ) const;
106  virtual void reduceAll(
107  const ValueTypeReductionOp<Ordinal,char> &reductOp
108  ,const Ordinal bytes, const char sendBuffer[], char globalReducts[]
109  ) const;
111  virtual void reduceAllAndScatter(
112  const ValueTypeReductionOp<Ordinal,char> &reductOp
113  ,const Ordinal sendBytes, const char sendBuffer[]
114  ,const Ordinal recvCounts[], char myGlobalReducts[]
115  ) const;
117  virtual void scan(
118  const ValueTypeReductionOp<Ordinal,char> &reductOp
119  ,const Ordinal bytes, const char sendBuffer[], char scanReducts[]
120  ) const;
122  virtual void send(
123  const Ordinal bytes, const char sendBuffer[], const int destRank
124  ) const;
126  virtual void ssend(
127  const Ordinal bytes, const char sendBuffer[], const int destRank
128  ) const;
130  virtual int receive(
131  const int sourceRank, const Ordinal bytes, char recvBuffer[]
132  ) const;
134  virtual void readySend(
135  const ArrayView<const char> &sendBuffer,
136  const int destRank
137  ) const;
139  virtual RCP<CommRequest> isend(
140  const ArrayView<const char> &sendBuffer,
141  const int destRank
142  ) const;
144  virtual RCP<CommRequest> ireceive(
145  const ArrayView<char> &Buffer,
146  const int sourceRank
147  ) const;
149  virtual void waitAll(
150  const ArrayView<RCP<CommRequest> > &requests
151  ) const;
153  virtual void
154  waitAll (const ArrayView<RCP<CommRequest> >& requests,
155  const ArrayView<RCP<CommStatus<Ordinal> > >& statuses) const;
157  virtual RCP<CommStatus<Ordinal> >
158  wait (const Ptr<RCP<CommRequest> >& request) const;
160  virtual RCP< Comm<Ordinal> > duplicate() const;
162  virtual RCP< Comm<Ordinal> > split(const int color, const int key) const;
164  virtual RCP< Comm<Ordinal> > createSubcommunicator(
165  const ArrayView<const int> & ranks) const;
166 
168

173  std::string description() const;

184 template<typename Ordinal>
185 RCP<SerialComm<Ordinal> > createSerialComm()
186 {
187  return Teuchos::rcp(new SerialComm<Ordinal>);
188 }

236  // Nothing to do

239 
240 template<typename Ordinal>
241 void SerialComm<Ordinal>::gatherAll(
242  const Ordinal sendBytes, const char sendBuffer[]
243  ,const Ordinal recvBytes, char recvBuffer[]
244  ) const
245 {
246  (void)sendBytes; // to remove "unused parameter" warning
247  (void)recvBytes;
248  (void)sendBuffer;
249  (void)recvBuffer;
250 #ifdef TEUCHOS_DEBUG
251  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT(!(sendBytes==recvBytes));
252 #endif
253  std::copy(sendBuffer,sendBuffer+sendBytes,recvBuffer);
254 }
255 
256 
257 template<typename Ordinal>
258 void SerialComm<Ordinal>::reduceAll(
259  const ValueTypeReductionOp<Ordinal,char> &reductOp
260  ,const Ordinal bytes, const char sendBuffer[], char globalReducts[]
261  ) const
262 {
263  (void)reductOp;
264  std::copy(sendBuffer,sendBuffer+bytes,globalReducts);
265 }
266 
267 
268 template<typename Ordinal>
269 void SerialComm<Ordinal>::reduceAllAndScatter(
270  const ValueTypeReductionOp<Ordinal,char> &reductOp
271  ,const Ordinal sendBytes, const char sendBuffer[]
272  ,const Ordinal recvCounts[], char myGlobalReducts[]
273  ) const
274 {
275  // Ignore unused arguments
276  (void)reductOp;
277  (void)sendBytes;
278  (void)sendBuffer;
279  (void)recvCounts;
280  (void)myGlobalReducts;
281 
282 #ifdef TEUCHOS_DEBUG
283  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT( recvCounts==NULL || recvCounts[0] != sendBytes );
284 #endif
285  std::copy(sendBuffer,sendBuffer+sendBytes,myGlobalReducts);
286 }
287 
288 
289 template<typename Ordinal>
290 void SerialComm<Ordinal>::scan(
291  const ValueTypeReductionOp<Ordinal,char> &reductOp
292  ,const Ordinal bytes, const char sendBuffer[], char scanReducts[]
293  ) const
294 {
295  (void)reductOp;
296  std::copy(sendBuffer,sendBuffer+bytes,scanReducts);
297 }

300 template<typename Ordinal>
301 void SerialComm<Ordinal>::send(
302  const Ordinal /*bytes*/, const char []/*sendBuffer*/, const int /*destRank*/
303  ) const
304 {
305  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
306  true, std::logic_error
307  ,"SerialComm<Ordinal>::send(...): Error, you can not call send(...) when you"
308  " only have one process!"
309  );
310 }
311 
312 
313 template<typename Ordinal>
314 void SerialComm<Ordinal>::ssend(
315  const Ordinal /*bytes*/, const char []/*sendBuffer*/, const int /*destRank*/
316  ) const
317 {
318  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
319  true, std::logic_error
320  ,"SerialComm<Ordinal>::send(...): Error, you can not call send(...) when you"
321  " only have one process!"
322  );
323 }
324 
325 
326 template<typename Ordinal>
327 int SerialComm<Ordinal>::receive(
328  const int /*sourceRank*/, const Ordinal /*bytes*/, char []/*recvBuffer*/
329  ) const
330 {
331  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
332  true, std::logic_error
333  ,"SerialComm<Ordinal>::receive(...): Error, you can not call receive(...) when you"
334  " only have one process!"
335  );
336  // The next line will never be reached, but a return is required on some platforms
337  return 0;
338 }

350  " only have one process!"

355 template<typename Ordinal>
356 RCP<CommRequest> SerialComm<Ordinal>::isend(
357  const ArrayView<const char> &/*sendBuffer*/,
358  const int /*destRank*/
359  ) const
360 {
361  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT(true);
362  return null;
363 }

372  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT(true);

377 template<typename Ordinal>
378 void SerialComm<Ordinal>::waitAll (const ArrayView<RCP<CommRequest> >& requests) const
379 {
380  (void) requests;
381  // There's nothing to wait on!
382 }
383 
384 
385 template<typename Ordinal>
386 void
387 SerialComm<Ordinal>::
388 waitAll (const ArrayView<RCP<CommRequest> >& requests,
389  const ArrayView<RCP<CommStatus<Ordinal> > >& statuses) const
390 {
391  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(statuses.size() < requests.size(),
392  std::invalid_argument, "Teuchos::SerialComm::waitAll: There are not enough "
393  "entries in the statuses array to hold all the results of the communication"
394  " requests. requests.size() = " << requests.size() << " > statuses.size() "
395  "= " << statuses.size() << ".");
396 
397  for (ArrayView<RCP<CommRequest> >::iterator it = requests.begin();
398  it != requests.end(); ++it) {
399  *it = null; // A postcondition of the Teuchos::Comm interface.
400  }
401 }
402 
403 template<typename Ordinal>
404 RCP<CommStatus<Ordinal> >
405 SerialComm<Ordinal>::wait (const Ptr<RCP<CommRequest> > & request) const
406 {
407  (void) request;
408  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(request.getRawPtr() == NULL, std::invalid_argument,
409  "Teuchos::SerialComm::wait: On input, the request pointer is null.");
410 
411  if (is_null (*request)) {
412  return null; // Nothing to wait on...
413  }
414  *request = null;
415  return rcp (new SerialCommStatus<Ordinal>);
416 }
417 
418 template< typename Ordinal>
419 RCP< Comm<Ordinal> >
420 SerialComm<Ordinal>::duplicate() const
421 {
422  return rcp(new SerialComm<Ordinal>(*this));
423 }
424 
425 template<typename Ordinal>
426 RCP< Comm<Ordinal> >
427 SerialComm<Ordinal>::split(const int color, const int /*key*/) const
428 {
429  if (color < 0) {
430  return RCP< Comm<Ordinal> >();
431  }
432  // Simply return a copy of this communicator.
433  return rcp(new SerialComm<Ordinal>(*this));
434 }
435 
436 template<typename Ordinal>
437 RCP< Comm<Ordinal> >
438 SerialComm<Ordinal>::createSubcommunicator(const ArrayView<const int> &ranks) const
439 {
440  if ((ranks.size()) == 1 && (ranks[0] == 0)) {
441  return rcp(new SerialComm<Ordinal>(*this));
442  } else {
443  return RCP< Comm<Ordinal> >();
444  }
445 }
446 
447 // Overridden from Describable
448 
449 
450 template<typename Ordinal>
451 std::string SerialComm<Ordinal>::description() const
452 {
453  std::ostringstream oss;
454  oss << "Teuchos::SerialComm<"<<OrdinalTraits<Ordinal>::name()<<">";
455  return oss.str();
456 }
